title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Lowest price ever: Save 36% on a 4-pack of Apple AirTags during Amazon’s Black Friday sale
items.description: Apple AirTags are currently on sale on Amazon for $17.97 for a single AirTag and $62.99 for a pack of four.

items.title: The best Black Friday travel items that real-world travelers are buying this week
items.description: If you want to make your holiday purchases a little more meaningful, take the lead from TPG readers and staff with these travel items.

items.title: Black Friday cash back shopping bonanza: Earn up to 50% cash back on online purchases today — yes, really!
items.description: Take a good Black Friday deal and make it a great one by earning huge amounts of cash back for popular online purchases.

items.title: Black Friday deals: Save up to 50% on these top 11 Amazon travel items
items.description: The online megastore releases new deals each day throughout the Black Friday period, so now is the time to add your most wanted products to your Amazo...

items.title: Reminder: Your Amex Platinum’s $50 Saks credit expires in December — here are 7 Black Friday sale items to buy
items.description: This use-it-or-lose-it credit resets twice yearly, which means December is your last chance.
